CGI should enhance a movie, not be it.I just watched Damsel on Netflix. I enjoyed it very much. There was a ton of CGI in it, but it was not the movie.Millie Bobbie Brown, an actress I first noticed in a sci-fi show ten years ago called Intruders. She was the only reason to watch it, I predicted then would be a great star, stars in this. She is the lone actor in at least two thirds of the movie and carries it fantastically.If you want to see a movie with great action and adventure along with acting, plot, and story, this is it.I hope this wins many awards next year.

title: For a new dragon movie...it was beautiful!
text: How are people not liking this?!Ok, so it's not perfect or the most amazing. But it was very, very nice. People are forgetting that very little original original ideas are made this days with the saturation of the movie entertainment space.The acting of Millie was just beautiful and don't get me started on the dragon animation!!!! That is one (if not the best) dragon designs. Very slip, pretty and it talks!Ok, so maybe the first part was a little rushed and a bit boring, and the script could have been a bit better but it all made up for that after seeing that gorgeous dragon!I can't take my eyes off of her. I just wished we had more after win scenes.

title: Absolutely loved this move!!
text: I wasn't expecting much of this movie since there's been so many similar movies but this truly was a really wonderful movie! Not the most over complicated story line but that made it even better. The tenacity and will to survive! The kindness to find way to forgive and let the pain heal! Truly able to see what women are capable of if we believe in ourselves. The strength and determination to move forward even through the pain. Millie Bobby Brown did a wonderful job! Her character was in pain and struggling, it wasn't easy but she pushed forward. Just love it! Just wonderful and would watch it many times!

title: I had a good time watching it
text: This movie was so much better than I expected. The plot was simple and quite predictable, but the story was very well told and I enjoyed every second of it. And for the record, simple is not bad, simple and well told is great and what we usually need!The special effects were ok in my opinion, the dragon was well made and looked quite scary.And of course, Millie is great as a lead, the role fits her like a glove. She does an amazing job being a princess, a victim and eventually a fighter.Marvel and DC, before you ever start blaming again the male audience for the poor reviews on your female centered movies, watch this movie and learn!

title: A Millie Bobby Brown vehicle
text: Yes, she carries this movie with some help from a pretty decent cast and a surprisingly good dragon for a streaming service (or any really). And we knew we knew the voice and were pleasantly surprised when we saw who did it.It is a bit of a slow start but once the action gets going, the story flows much better, even if it is a bit predictable. The plot reminded me of an episode of the Original Star Trek (actually, a few episodes).And there are other scenes that will bring a little deja vu from other movies and shows you may have seen over the years.Give it a few minutes. Millie is worth the wait.

title: Not bad
text: Not sure what all the bad reviews are about here, yes the story is quite simple, but it kept me hooked all the way through, loved the dragon and it's voice, enjoyed the action CGI and dark theme, overall a decent fantasy movie, that tried something a little different from the usual.If you like a fantasy movie , like dragons/mythical creatures you could do a lot worse than this movie ,I think it was quite refreshing in the way the story progressed, while it was a simple story the way it kept you hooked with the action sequences was good, and left me wanting to see more, I'd definitely like to see a second movie revolving around the characters.

title: We loved it!
text: Simple but enjoyable movie, Well worth a watch.Game of thrones in 2 hours can you ask for more? And honestly a much better ending in our opinion.Story was very simple & clean we honestly miss the simplicity of movies like this, not much background drama to follow.The lead female actor was awesome, she ft the part perfect, the CGI was EXCELLENT. Almost reminded me of Wizard of OZ with its simplicity.To us a great little flick for the 2 hours before bed schedule, you could watch this while typing a report and still not miss much.They could make a second movie& it has to be better than GOT ;)

title: Such a brilliant movie best fairy story for decades
text: This is such an amazing movie. One of the best films I have seen. Millie Bobby Brown is an amazing actress in this film. The special effects are amazingly well done. The fire breathing dragon is brilliantly portrayed. I like the way something earlier in the movie does not seem important and near the end of the movie it's a vital item. I won't say what it is you need to watch it all the way through. Every time you think you know what will happen next it doesn't and something more amazing happens instead. The last 20 minutes of the movie is worth waiting for its unexpected ending. Millie Bobby Brown starts the film as your average fairytale princess but by the end of the film she has turned into a Zena Warrior Princess like character. Maybe not suitable for very young children but older kids will love it. Don't miss your chance to see it on Netflix.

title: The story that changes EVERYTHING!
text: Outstanding! That's all I have to say!For some reason, this film showed me something entirely different. It's like a story about romance and adventure, but with darker twists and turns.Millie Bobby Brown who we both know from Stranger Things as Eleven, and as Enola Holmes, does her most outstanding performance as Princess Elodie.Usually dragons do not terrify me, but this one in Damsel actually terrify me in ways I never thought can be possible in the dark.Survival is a main priority when escaping a deadly creature. Let alone having difficulty in facing what is aheadStill, this film had me hooked until the end, and I recommend this one!

title: I don't understand the bad reviews!
text: I don't understand the bad reviews. Damsel was definitely an adventurous, fun, exciting, and engaging movie that me and my family enjoyed watching. Millie Bobby Brown and the other actors and actresses gave a spectacular performance. The special effects were pretty good. The dialogue was nice, a bit choppy though. The pacing was great, I was engaged and not bored at all throughout this movie. However, I will say it was quite predictable. I guessed every single plot twist in here. Not very original, but it still was fun to watch. I didn't really like the ending, it was a bit...unsatisfying and predictable. Towards the end, it was a bit slow, but I didn't really mind it. Damsel had a lot of potential, but it fell short a bit. Definitely not the most original movie, but I think Damsel is still a fun and adventurous movie anyone could enjoy if you're fine with a pretty predictable film.

title: A creepy fairy tale
text: I feel like this is exactly what people mean when they say they want an original live-action princess movie instead of all the remakes! There's just something so nice about seeing a story being told you haven't already seen before. It feels fresh and exciting, no matter what the plot actually is. And don't get me wrong, I love a good remake, but I also really appreciate it when a new story gets told.All in all, this movie seemed to combine the vibes of a classical fairy tale with heavy doses of the adventure, fantasy and horror genre, while also adding a modern, feminist twist. And I gotta say, the end result was actually pretty cool.P. S. Am I the only one who kind of wants a dragon sidekick now?

title: Enjoyed!
text: Angela Bassett never disappoints! Entertaining from the "I Do's" to the immense terror. So fascinating. The cinematics were really good too. That first cave scene had me feeling trapped and ready to run but wanting desperately to see what thing lived inside. Couldn't imagine how they would pick up centuries later but they somehow did. After the initial scene, the pace slowed quite a bit but eventually picked back up. Angela brought the drama like only Angela can but I wish she had bigger parts. Also, it's not too clear why she was sent to marry given all the time they had to explain it. Still a good watch.

title: I liked it
text: It was an enjoyable watch. No twists you couldn't predict but well done. The start is a little slow and lasts a little too long into the film, but otherwise pacing is on point.Some of the CGI is a little clunky, but I really liked the difference in overall ambience between the underground and above ground scenes.Another important point is that the dark scenes were easily watchable and there were no issues with seeing what was happening.Great acting by MBB and loved the dragon. Not a nice fairytale dragon but looking all spiny and spiky and much more nimble than some. Voice casting great also.Overall a very good watch and worth the time and effort.

title: Cinematic marvel !!!
text: This movie ticks every checkbox of being a one of its kind . Be it animation ,Story , acting , direction , sound effects , just wow !!Special mention for a powerful acting of Millie Bobby Brown. She is a powerhouse of acting !!Story was a bit predicatable but doesnt matter , you will enjoy every bit of it .Dragon animation was very well crafted and her fire breath melting the rocks into lava , was mindblowing effect.Sound effects and the climax scene was a show stopper .I attention to details for every scene is what I enjoyed too .This is a kind of fairy tale created for every age group to enjoy !!Just perfect !! 10/10.

title: Don't listen to the naysayers!
text: The only thing that this film is guilty of is, it's a touch cheesy here and there. The cast is great, the effects are really good. The writing isn't terrible either and the story is super original and it has a well rounded ending. I thoroughly enjoyed this film more than I expected to by far. If you're into medieval genre and just want something fun to watch, I do recommend this movie the whole time I was rooting for the dragon lol I think they did a really good job, I mean it's still on Netflix film it's not gonna be the next Schindler's list so if you manage your expectations, then I don't think you will be disappointed. Plus, Millie Bobby Brown deserves more credit than I think she gets!

title: I liked it a lot!
text: Its a lovely film. Good acting and special effects very good as well. The dragon uau...! Landscapes very very beautiful, lets hope its not all AI. The colors very bright and music as well very pretty.The plot was a bit predictable and at first it was a bit hard to hate a dragon, you know GOT and stuff, one got attached to this creatures.. but in the end... all was .... well no spoiler. Watch it.*I always seem to find BiBB so much older than she is... it really puzzles me.*i wonder where it was filmed... hummm.. might visit.*is the a number 2 film? Maybe not.*that prince ffs... seriously?

title: Critics do not understand the people
text: This movie was simply phenomenal. The soundtrack, VFX, and writing were all top tier. Millie Bobbie Brown did a fantastic job as the lead actress, especially given that it was, for the most part, a solo movie. How this movie received such bad critic reviews simply serves to prove that the "professional critics" do not know what the people like to watch. It was filled with suspense, despite some parts being readable a little in advance. Not to discredit the faults that some people have found, as many of those are to personal taste, but they have taken some plot points that can come across as overused and made them into what is, in my opinion, one of the earliest cinematic masterpieces of 2024.

title: A damsel who believes in herself 🔥
text: It is always enjoyable for me to explore fantasy world and escape reality even if it is for a short time! But when a movie is too long but can't keep up with that duration with it's charm then we get back to reality again! But trust me In this case,Damsel is the good one cz the duration of the movie is perfect for it's storyline and twist and turns! Couldn't have said that if it was a longer time movie with same storyline. At first they will keep it slow for you to slowly get into the story but the time "Damsel is thrown into the Dragon's cave", that's when the real story begins and you will not be able to relax for a second & the twists and turns will keep your attention all the time!What we can learn from the movie is that we should believe in ourselves even when things are not in our hand entirely and when things might seem impossible! Just because everyone before us couldn't do it doesn't mean we can't!

title: Great fantasy movie!!
text: This is an amazing adventure with princess, exotic Kingdom, and dragons. Thoroughly enjoyable ride, my kids and I had a blast! It is a shock, survival, and revenge flick that works together to make an very enjoyable overall experience. I would watch it again with others who haven't seen it already, which to me says that it was a great movie! The scenes from the new kingdom are absolutely amazing, it's what fairy tales are made of. The very positive, happy, and uplifting story at the beginning with the amazing scenery just work to provide a very positive mood, this is followed by some question and doubts, and then the movie gets darker with a satisfying revenge style ending.

title: Beautiful
text: This was exactly what I expected from this film. A little predictable but that just proves that it's well written. I enjoyed this and it reminded me of a lot of the female main character books I read! Wonderful! If you are into fantasy, FMC, and no love interest you will love this movie! The CGI was why you would expect with Netflix. The story was well written and had thought out foreshadows. Milly Bobby Brown is amazing as expected. And the costumes!! I understand why some wouldn't enjoy this but this is truly one for the girls. I couldn't turn away from the screen for a single moment! !!!!!!

title: This was never going to be an award winner
text: First, I understand why this went to Netflix. It was never going to sell well in today's modern box office. 20 years ago it would have been a 350 million dollar film just in the USA but steaming changed everything. People don't go to the box office just to be entertained anymore. They need an event to get them off the couch and this was not an event film. It was however entertaining in a way you rarely see these days because Hollywood won't take the risk on just entertaining with the budget this film obviously had.If you like fantasy you'll love this. It hits all the marks for a 2 hour movie. Exactly the right amount of time spent on backstory character development and the action. To often today 80% of the movie is backstory and character development leaving the plot to be compressed into the last 20 minutes. Blame GOT. Movie producers now think they need to make this show into ever fantasy movie they make. It's impossible. It would have ruined Damsel. But thankfully someone in charge saw that and made the movie that needed to happen. A star studded cast mostly wasted on a story line that mediocre but good enough to keep you interested. A plot that has holes. Action that can feel a bit forced. Actors that defintely feel forced. And all of it blended together perfectly to make a movie you can just enjoy.

title: Loved it
text: This film was fantastic! Millie Bobbie Brown portrayed her character flawlessly and I was enraptured through the entire film.There are good plot turns, and a good pace which involves action and intellect. There was tension and intrigue throughout the story and I enjoyed routing for the main character and let's just say, the villains get what's coming to them, which was very satisfying.The visuals are stunning, both the scene setting and the wardrobe - the artists and stylists did a really good job.I would recommend giving this a watch, it is a brilliantly done film and an absolute 10/10.

title: Thorough enjoyed this fantasy
text: Why is everyone these days expecting all new film releases to be of spectacular wonder...... expectations are too high for some, try enjoying a film for what it is.This film was a great watch and it is about time fantasy films were back on our screens, and this is possibly the most believable looking dragon.A good standard of acting from some young actors, some scenes weren't the best maybe but I was glued to the screen. I believe the choice of actors was well thought out as well as the voice of the dragon.Damsel isn't without its flaws but I wouldn't hesitate to recommend it and would absolutely watch it again.

title: Enjoyable
text: Though Damsel projected almost its entire story in the trailer, I found it enjoyable. I always love seeing Robin Wright and Angela Bassett, Millie was also great. But the real standout is the Dragon, voiced by Shohreh Aghdashloo who's voice I just adore.The visuals in the movie are stellar and what they are able to accomplish with just Millie on screen is fantastic. I do wish the backstory had been better fleshed out and I think they should have done more with the prince. I have read that the book does a better job with both.This is definitely a B movie but it's a good time and people should watch it in that vein. It's a fun movie with a nice ending.

title: Personally I think it was a good movie
text: Between the casting, story, plot and even the writing I would say this is a very good movie. I believe it truly shows how strong and determined a woman can be when she puts her mind to it and truly embarks on a journey it may seem impossible to do alone. I did believe that this movie was a tad over foreshadowing and the trailer giving away most of the plot, giving not much to the imagination. It was repetitive at times and I believe there was over acting (as one would do for theatrical play) to show the emotion; It reminded me about the end of sleeping beauty but changed to a different time and character arc, but overall I would give this movie a 8/10.

title: The idea is simple and straightforward
text: I enjoyed the seamless flow of the narrative in this film, finding it remarkably easy to follow and engage with. The simplicity of its storytelling was refreshing, offering a straightforward yet captivating experience. It's a testament to the skill of the filmmakers in crafting a movie that effortlessly draws the audience in and keeps them invested from start to finish. Personally, I have a soft spot for movies like this, where the focus is on storytelling without unnecessary complexities. This film exemplifies the beauty of simplicity, delivering an enjoyable and accessible cinematic experience that is sure to resonate with a wide audience. From its compelling characters to its well-paced plot, every element comes together harmoniously to create a memorable viewing experience.

title: OKAY, EPIC YOU GOT THIS.
text: Love this movieess, good visual: cinematography, color grading, good angle and great POV. Makes me feels like really get into it. Audio: love the sfx, they really can make me scared, happy, and also frustating. The audio really suits with the visual. Storyline:fast pace, detailed one. Maybe at some scene i feel kinda bored, but all good. And at really time i can guess what happened at the next, like "oh maybe she will like this, oh maybe it will be like this." but its not annoy me at all. Good actors, perfect for what they act as, good acting. Oh, maybe i only feel weird about the dragon, the voice kinda annoy me.

title: Wow, that was an incredible film!
text:
Glad they still make such amazing films! It's so thrilling to watch! The suspense, the surprise, everything is so incredible! Absolutely loved the performance of the main actress, what a perfect choice for this role!Writing this comment a minute after finishing watching the film and I am so impressed with the storyline and the idea it it all.Everybody loves a story about dragons, this is definitely a good one. In the world of cinema, the following quote applies when it comes to this movie:
"You see, there are still faint glimmers of civilisation left in this barbaric slaughterhouse that was once known as humanity."
So many barbaric films nowadays, but this one is a good one.

title: Fun and not so self-righteous
text: It's a fun film with an enjoyable plot and an interesting protagonist. Gloriously refreshing to have a strong female lead that wasn't ruined by gratuitous virtue signalling. Yes the twists within the movie are predictable... so what? The talent was mostly well used and it was a film one could easily enter the world of and enjoy. A far better film than the endless remakes of male action heroes that are far more derivative than this. I encourage the production of a sequel and would watch it gladly. Honestly I'd love to see how the character of the dragon develops; the cgi on that was fantastic!!

title: Love the creature flicks
text:
Simple story, but i loved it, very well executed plus the vfx was done superb
Dragon looks real, fierce like they should be
Loved the entire movie, the things she had to do to survive, will she survive? Everything was done well
U can surely predict the ending too, but still it's amazing, they could have improved it and let me tell u how
When she cuts the dragon first time, blood spilled should fall on her cuts, then she should say now i smell of ur blood, does it make me your child or something like that
Yet the movie was amazing
Just finished it, a perfect family movie, no unnecessary nudity or stuff like that, make more of it.

title: Most Beautiful and touching story, one of the best in 2024
text: I dont know why people give low ratings to such beautifully made movies, there should be more appreciations. Entire movie was so beautiful and the acting of Millie Bobby Brown was so nice. The Music was great and it was like an epic adventure. I can see clearly see that a part 2 of this movie can be great continuation of the story.This movie is pure and eligant and the VFX was great and did not feel as if it was sluggy or crappy. The costumes, the acting of all casts, the music and epic castles and everying feels so smooth as if a piece of art.So I would reccomend it to anyone looking for entertainment and an enjoyable fantasy movie.

title: of course everyone is complaining
text: We have become an army of complainers. Giving this movie 1-3 points is a statement, not a rating. The production values are good, it is entertaining, it is not the 1000th rehash like some crime thrillers and MB Brown is interesting enough to watch, even if the movie itself would be bad. So even if you dislike this movie, there is enough going on for 5 stars. If you need arthouse, mega intelligent cinema with twists that noone is aware of ahead of the time, don't watch a mainstream production with the hot shooting star ("hot" as in "agent has a lot of work reading all those scripts).But this one is not bad, it is cool and intersting. Only because you see some twists coming does not automatically make this a dumb movie.Is this the next "Citizen Kane"? No, it is not, but if you want a nice family event in front of the TV, it is by far good enough.

title: The ultimate (badass) anti-fairytale
text: I went into watching this movie not knowing much and simply expecting a mediocre action fantasy film... This one somehow went straight to Netflix and bypassed theaters, but now that I've seen it, it doesn't matter because it exceeded any expectations I could've had. The words that immediately came to mind at the end were, "that was bad ass!" There's not many movies to say that about these days.The story is a breath of fresh air in the fact that it is an original plot, for once. It takes bits and pieces of classic favorite elements and brings them together but it doesn't "copy" anything. The movie makes one heck of a statement and makes it tastefully. The acting is top shelf, MBB gives an amazing performance where you just want to root for her. All of the characters are likable and the scenes are beautiful. The music by Fleming and Zimmer is flawless, creating a deeper level of atmosphere and meaning in every scene. The movie gives off mysterious nostalgic vibes in many areas that take you back to the magic of watching a movie as a kid again.Don't pay attention to any bad ratings or the critics... watch it for yourself and see what you think. For me, it was an awesome surprise and an extremely fun ride, and the ultimate (badass) anti-fairytale. Just try and have fun and you'll love it!

title: This is the end of your story!
text: I don't write reviews on here as I've never felt the need. But seeing how low people are rating this film, I had to give my own thoughts. I thought this film was brilliant. Millie Bobby Brown I have always found an amazing actress in everything she does, but in this? She kicks ass and takes names. The only reason I rated it a 9 is because in most parts of the film it's set in the dark (I won't reveal why as spoilers) so in parts it was a little hard to see what was going on. I implore you to give it a watch and make up your own opinion and take the lower rated reviews with a pinch of salt. It may not be your thing of course, but it may just be right up your alley.

title: MBB shines again as the new mother of dragons
text: I'd heard glowing reports about this film and I wasn't disappointed. The premise of the film is exactly up my street and what followed was thoroughly enjoyable movie. It's a clever story and the sets are stunning. Music is also brilliant, Hans Zimmer at his usual best. Millie Bobby Brown absolutely shines in this role. Her acting never fails to amaze me for someone so young. Clever effects, a great cast who help move the story along and the characters draw you in. I would recommend this film to anyone who enjoys a Netflix and chill night and enjoys just escaping from the world for a while. Well done all involved.

title: Netflix film? Normally not your style of movie?! Watch this one.
text: For those of you out there that doubt platform made/original movies much like I do. I have to say I was definitely NOT expecting to like this movie and especially as much as I do. In fact I plan to rewatch it now because I am a movie lover and everyone misses things the first time around. If you love fantasy, drama, action, thriller or any of the combo this is a good one. I myself like dragons, I'm not a fan of medieval movies by any means but it has a setting more like the lord of the rings and Eragon to which I enjoy very much. This movie also has a dragon, it also stars Millie Bobbi Brown an upcoming star, for those reasons I gave this movie a chance. The graphics are good for a platform original movie. Please at least give it one chance before turning away from it, who knows maybe you'll also be glad you didn't!

title: It was amazing movie !
text: I can't wait to see where Elodie's story goes with the dragon in this movie. The bond between them is so special and I am eager to see how it develops further. This film has quickly become one of my favorites when it comes to stories about dragons. The way Elodie and the dragon interact and the adventures they go on together are truly captivating. I hope the movie is long so that we can fully explore their relationship and the world they inhabit. The thought of more scenes with the dragon and Elodie fills me with excitement and I look forward to being immersed in their story for as long as possible.

title: What's with the bad reviews? This was a great movie!
text: Come on guys.... It's Millie Bobby Brown! She's an amazing actress. I'm glad to see her in a roll outside of Stranger Things that has just as much "epic-ness." There was never a dull moment throughout this whole film. It's lacking something ... a bit of depth if anything but overall very very enjoyable! It's no LOTR or The Hobbit, however, the cinematography is fantastic! I absolutely love the CGI of the dragon - it's not super fake and gives me chills - definitely a close second to Smaug! For anyone saying this is "lame," you obviously don't like fantasy, dragons, etc so maybe sit this one out instead of leaving lame reviews.

title: Damsel ...I loved it
text: Once upon a time in a land that isn't here !! There was a story of a girl a Damsel you might say ! I don't want to spoil the story for any one so I won't . I thought this film is really worth watching. It's a really good story with a great heroine, who is believable. Please dear reader do not take any notice of the other reviewers that have said it's a hopeless film. This film really is not hopeless at all . When Netflix make films as good as this it makes you feel you are getting value for money from your membership. So if you are looking for a good film to watch this weekend then why not watch Damsel, I think you will enjoy it !! Enjoy .. Tim.

title: Good, not great but watchable!
text: This was a decently done movie. While I agree with the near criminal misuse of a talent like Angela Bassett, this movie was enjoyable to watch. Robin Wright was fantastic at her role and young. Millie Bobbie Brown plays the heroine to perfection. Only real complaint I have is how they spent effort on making the prince semi-likeable, without any purpose what-so-ever. Reviews on this movie are unfair and just carbon copy other negative reviews. The special effects were enjoyable, especially the fire. If one were to go into this movie without the expectations of any award-winning performances, one will be pleased with the experience of having seen the movie.

title: Fantastic!
text: Absolutely brilliant, loved it. Just a great lovely storyline. Dragon is fantastic! Kind of reminds me of Dragon Heart but not sad like that was.Made really well and the special effects are cracking! Love Ray Winston, he is a phenomenal presence in films, Millie is going to have an awesome career.Great Saturday afternoon film to watch on Netflix, ignore the low ratings from these people, it's an easy watch and not what you would expect when you first begin to watch this almost fairy tale!Shows strong independent fierce women especially as it's been international women's week!Give it a watch!

title: Haters gonna hate
text: After watching the movie and reading the reviews, I wonder if I watched the same movie or had the same expectations going in.Will this win Millie Bobbie any amazing awards like an Emmy? I'll go on a limb and say, "Nope." It's not that her acting was bad, it was just good.While I've been waiting for it to hit since I saw first trailer and wondered why Stranger Things was taking such a weird angle of El v Vecna, it was everything I hoped it would be. A great popcorn movie I could kickback and enjoy. The story, the action, the visuals all met what I want in this type of moment: a good time. Were there plot points I figured out quickly? Sure. There were also nice dips and dives that made me wonder how things would wrap up ... which they did and didn't play out the way I thought. Which is a good thing. Which is why I like this movie.

title: Good fantasy story line...
text: I liked the storyline and the series of events. Not the best i have seen but with the emotion, action, adventure, and revenge points it was great to watch with wanting more. Anyone can find the negatives in a movie, but for the limited amount of run time for a movie... good job.Evidently this is too short of a review, so... let's mention the emotional impact. Happiness, sorrow, fear, etc... All the elements of an epic theatrical adventure. Cheering for the main character and hoping for the best, Millie's character used her own inner strength to fight and stay alive. With the element of forgiveness and hope in the midst of doom she using that to help her persevere.Nuff said.

title: Why rate so high?
text: I'm really logical when it comes to movies. First, I don't look at directors/producers/cinema critics artsy stuff. I want a movie with a sound plot, good acting (which makes it believable), good special effects, good costuming and a beautiful setting. If a horrendous movie is a 0, then an ok movie would be three, average 5, good a 7 & 10 amazing.Actually, I might have rated it a little low! The plot was good. There were no holes & it made perfect sense. Costuming was beautiful. The landscape was absolutely breathtaking. The acting was great. There wasn't any bad acting. I don't know what another reviewer was talking about the y King being "ok". I think all he did was nod his head once. I don't remember any lines now.The special effects were really good. I didn't notice any size difference in the dragon. Of course it would look smaller or larger according to the size differences in the caverns.All in all, it was a really good movie. Highly recommended.

title: Inspiring and beautiful!
text: First of all, Millie B. B was the perfect actress for this powerful role. As a teenage girl, this movie was so beautiful. Not only was the special effects done nicely, but the message this movie sends is done amazing. The moral of this movie is that woman are strong and independent, we are smart and elegant. Elodie starts the movie by saying this is not a movie where damsel in distress (woman in dager) is saved by a prince. Through this movie we get to understand that quote, the prince is a total wuss and the innocent "princesses" are smart and saves themself. Not only was Elodie a smart woman, but all the woman before her. This movie is 10/10 and should definitely get an award for it's beautiful work.

title: Very nice set up for a sequel.
text: I thought it was a really good watch. Sets itself up for a promising sequel which could be really exciting. I wonder where they will go with it. I immediately googled damsel 2 for updates even though I knew it was too early on. Sadly, I doubt it looking at the many poor short sighted reviews.The dragon was seriously cool, the acting was good. Admittedly, after watching the trailer I thought it would be rubbish. I was mistaken and to my surprise it was awesome. I'm a real film buff, so I always give films the time to set up a good story and that it was. Very impressed.I hope they make a sequel.

title: One (great) woman show!
text: The plot may be a little sinister but Milly Bobby Brown's performance took it to a completely new level. All actors and actresses did an excellent job in portraying their character however Milly had to cover a moltitude of different emotions and feelings for most of the film. For example, when she was lost and scared, she looked lost and scared; when terrified, she looked incredibly terrified; when outraged she looked ready to kill just by her own glance. Her skill in portraying emotions is outstanding given the fact that she was the only human and couldn't utter a single word to express herself. The story is quite original, actually perfect for a computer or PlayStation game. Throughout the entire movie, the only time when I raised my eyebrows was for the CGI effect when in a couple of occasions the fire and the dragon looked totally fake they almost reminded me of the first original Japanese Godzilla's movies. If you are a gamer like me, you are gonna love this movie but if you are a Walt Disney's fan, just start running and never look back!

title: Amazing!
text: This is an incredible movie!!!! I love the storyline, the actors, and the acting. Do not listen to the haters this was a very good movie. Some people have been saying it is basic. WHAT!!! This is absolutely not a basic story. I mean there is an ancient debt that is needed to be paid, a wedding that turns into a sacrifice and there is no "Damsel" there is just a powerful story about a girl getting married only to be sacrificed. If you watch the movie you will absolutely know what I mean. Some might just say that it is awful and I say "Sat what you want this is a great movie!" I do not know why this movie gets hated on SO much!

title: Handsome, not too feminist, fantasy TV
text: The broadly drawn tropes and characters are more for kids age 8 to 18. For adults who like imaginative fantasy, it's classic, handsomely produced Netflix TV. The narrative is a 100% inversion of the damsel in distress trope. Thanks god it's not overly feminist. Glorious to watch Millie-Bobbie go thru a very physical performance and triumph in the end.This handsome, watchable mounting an visual storytelling is benefitted by previs by Third Story.Courtney Lanning - @CourtneyMovies on Twitter: "Let's not overlook Shohreh Aghdashloo's role as the dragon. Top notch voice work and my favorite dragon voice since Smaug."Dozens of many difficult, challenging CGI compositing shots are handled with grace and ease, by 4-5 VFX houses. As usual when 3-5 effects houses collaborate on a project, the visual storytelling keeps improving until the end of editing.Even if not an oscar-winning film, everyone involvled can be proud of this effort. Cheers!

title: Impressed!
text: This movie was magnificent! The characters were well written and performed wonderfully! The action, the graphics, the story. Humanity the good and the bad, the classic tale of sacrificing a princess to a dragon but adding why and how and where and when with twists like unused before. My only complaint is that there isn't a second movie that I am aware of because the potential from this to continue is limitless! This was on par with Game of Thrones and everything was just beautiful and magnificent. This is worth the watch with the beautiful landscape images, the castles, the dragon, the tales and the heros this movie creates.

title: Who rates a movie one star??
text: This was a very entertaining storyline. A real twist. The acting was 99% I found Millie Bobby Brown to be an excellent actress for the part. She was the most lovable in my opinion. But as in real life there are faults to us all. As well as in this movie. I found the characters to all have the moral dilemmas of their own. Which made for excellent pay off when resolved.I think whoever rates a movie like this a 1 star has an alt motive. My parents and friends all liked it and rated it an 8 at least. We are very picky as well. It does drag on in the middle where she is in the cave. But for me, it redeemed itself closer to the end. This was where you don't want to miss the details. I love how everything unfolded naturally and they used a lot of "show don't tell" so if you're a fan of this style where a main character is a selfless heroine you'll enjoy this movie.People who rated this 1 star are people who probably would rate it 10 if it was a male lead. Like I'm sorry but why does this being a strong woman lead make this left? Don't bring politics into my movies boys. I give the 1 star ratings one star. They just political. Why can't we enjoy movies anymore without politics! Millie Bobby Brown is an excellent actress for her age too!! She was only 18 or 19 when this was filmed. So good! Anyways, I hope you get to enjoy the movie and have an amazing day or week! And if you're not I reckon you watch this and let it inspire you to not be a victim to anything!

title: Normal people will like it fine.
text: The movie is really good with twists and turns that are believable. Definitely not a disney like princess movie. It is from the perspective of the lead cast, feels based on old times and stays away from the current day politics or overacting.The acting of all the characters is really great. You will see the struggle and fear or anger. The storyline is good as well with good ending. Normal people will like it just fine. I have not seen a good movie with such a plot in a long time. Reminds me of the stories I read when I was young.It is however a bit rushed in a sense where what should have happened in weeks at least has portrayed happened in days. Which steals many of the feelings one would feel given the situation. This makes it one time watch rather then an epic. But definitely a must watch movie.

title: This is an awesome movie
text: Don't believe the negative reviews. It's a great movie. Great acting and surprisingly entertaining. It's actually safe to watch with for the family. A bit of violence but for a movie I've never heard of I was very surprised. Do yourself a favor and save this for movie night. Trust me. I read the reviews and decided to watch it anyway and I'm glad I did. What the heck and I doing still typing even though I've already said all I have to say about this movie. I will never leave another review on IMDB again. This is ridiculous that you have to type this much information to leave a review. Ok. This is all I have.

title: What is the problem?
text: When did moviegoers start nit-picking every tiny thing and stop just enjoying movies?Was this the best fantasy movie ever made? No, it wasn't.Was the cinematography so breathtaking it brought tears to your eye? Nope. None of that here.Was the script perfect in every way? Yeah, not so much.Was the acting superior to anything you've ever seen before? Not really. It was good, but didn't quite reach a level of excellence.Was the story unique in every way? I have to admit it was a tad predictable.However, with all that, I was able to sit back and just enjoy myself with a bit of frivolous entertainment. In fact, it's worth watching again.So, you nit-pickers can keep searching for flaws and faults if you like. I plan to keep searching out enjoyable frivolous entertainment.

title: Best Movie!
text: This movie truly stands out in its genre, with a unique and engaging storyline that keeps you on the edge of your seat. The director's vision is brilliantly executed, and the script is both witty and profound.Damsel is a visual treat, with stunning landscapes and meticulously designed sets that transport you to another world. The film's score adds an extra layer of depth and emotion to the storytelling.This movie is a testament to the power of storytelling and the potential of the film medium. It leaves a lasting impact on viewers, sparking conversations and reflections long after the credits roll.

title: I did NOT see that coming
text: I was a bit apprehensive about watching this movie because there are too many strong and powerful women who need no man movies. THIS IS NOT ONE OF THOSE!This is a story of a powerful woman - yes. This is a story of love - yes. This is a story that has fantastic writing - yes. Did it help me escape my current reality - yes.I was highly impressed with the acting. I didn't quite know who the actors were until I searched here AFTER the movie was over. These 2 women are truly talented and I will be checking out all their other shows!The scenery and special effects took my breath away. I felt like I was in that castle. I was INSIDE that cave. I could feel the fire.This is one of those rare movies that made me have an emotional moment...Do you need to have a carefree escape from reality? Watch this and escape.

title: Loved it
text: Not sure about the bad reviews.. we loved it. Sure, maybe it's not the most cinematically pleasing piece for some, but overall it was a good movie. Millie's character is a boss. It's a movie about a princess going up against a dragon, and there were definitely parts that surprised me! We'd watch it again. Loved the action and how eerie some scenes felt. There were a few twists I wasn't expecting. I love how they don't really show the full dragon at first. More unravels throughout and it had us gripping to see what happened next. Not as predictable as some reviews might have said, as I mentioned there were def some twists! Just watch it!

title: If you want R content like GoT go elsewhere. This is an action fantasy w/ a Damsel, trying to survive.
text: Is it predictable? Yes, very much so. But, if you love fantasy with an awesome dragon, it is worth the watch.If you want R content like GoT go elsewhere. This is an action fantasy w/ a Damsel, trying to survive. Hence the title Damsel. If you have never been around or believe there are women who can do things even many men can't; this is not for you. I, however, have seen these women while in the military. If that hurts your man card, don't watch this. If you just want to see a decent fantasy movie, one with an awesome dragon and a Damsel without the Prince, whatever,,l it kept my attention. This while in chronic pain, it helped me be preoccupied and lesson a bad day pain.I believe so many movies with a damsel, that can fight and or survive, is almost always going to get worse critical reviews than one with a guy(s) in it. It is a fantasy movie, that is PG13. It doesn't have any sex, nudity, and such. Mostly violence from a dragon. If that is not what you are looking for go watch GoT. Remember, many movies are n9tnfor every single person.

title: Not to kill your dragon
text: This movie was advertised as a "deconstruction" of fairy tales of a certain kind, but the viewers are already so used to deconstructing everything that the plot probably can't strike anyone as particularly unusual or shocking. Just remember how many on-screen stories we have seen in previous decades which invert the common tropes of fairy tales: Into the Woods, Shrek, Maleficent, and many, many others.The parallels with The Game of Thrones are also banal but inevitable. Elodie comes from the North where the living conditions are extremely harsh. The winter is coming... or, rather, the winter was always there, probably that is why the daughters of the North are every moment ready to become maiden warriors. Naïve and excited Sansa comes to the Southern lands, to be fooled and betrayed by her Joffrey. Then, Millie Bobby Brown ardently cosplays Arya Stark. At last, she gets an ending which, as many think, Daenerys should have gotten. The idea itself is not bad, but the plot feels too rushed, so there is not too much place for character development.But the biggest problem with Damsel is probably one message, which is disturbing, at the very least. Elodie presents herself as innocent because she doesn't really belong to the family which wronged the dragon. But would the princesses from that very family be guilty, would it be right for the dragon to sadistically torment and kill them? It is like something from the Old Testament: "or, some your grand-grand-grandfather committed a crime, so you must die in an especially perverse and horrifying way". Again, such reasoning would be no problem in a world alike to that of The Game of Thrones, but Damsel is too conventional for it, and should better have a conventional moral.In effect, this hybrid of very dark fantasy elements and family-friendly moments is not something epochal and doesn't match such witty, inventive and timeless classics with dragons as Dragonheart or Shrek. Nevertheless, it is entertaining and gets some things right. Damsel overcomes the trope of an evil stepmother, it doesn't have something as cliché as a romance with the dragon as one of the participants, and sisterly love provides some touching scenes.Even if Damsel is not too original as a fantasy story, it can be good as a grim metaphor of a young girl suddenly finding out that her prince is not the person she thought him to be. A personification of teenager fears before starting an intimate relationship. A cautionary tale against judging a person or a place by their looks, however gorgeous they may be. It is also very important.

title: The Perfect Twist
text:
This movie is The perfect twist on movies like Lord of the Rings.I became incredibly bored in Lord of the Rings simply because EVERY SINGLE THING & EVERY SINGLE PLACE was given a name as ;
"This is the magical 'SOMETHING' of 'SOMETHING' (or 'SOMEONE') in order to apparently give it (item? Sword? Canyons? Swamp?) more importance.For eg; "This is The Sword of Layman" OR "The Canyons of Gi-ord" OR "The Sandwich of the Almighty Subway!"
My Goodness.. Give it a rest.. & let me watch "The TV of Andrew !!"
DAMSEL is not like this at all.It's has an awesome twist to this genre.Worth every second.

title: One of the best films. Ever.
text: It's a metaphor for life!! I won't spoil it, but my god this is an excellent film. A real tribute to those going through difficult times. You can see the temptation to give up, but the ultimate reason why you never should.If you like period dramas but are keen to see a woman kick arse, this is for you. Keep going through the beginning - it will absolutely lull you into a false sense of security.I couldn't keep my eyes off the screen. I was actually shouting at Elodie telling her what to do - don't think I've been this involved with a film for a long time. I honestly cannot recommend enough. My only criticism - I wish it was a series so I could have had more of it.

title: Landfill quality
text: Reading through reviews it appears is very polarizing movie but is to be expected.Many of the positive reviews come from her fans. I mean let's face it she could war a shoe on her head for the entire duration of the film and you'd still like it. So if you're a fan then you gonna like it.For everyone else I am sorry to disappoint you but the movie is not great. Brown's performance is poor, the plot is lame, and the movie is largely garbage. The lead acctress pioneers an entirely new type of strong female role: the cute giggly girl with a hidden fire that bruns brighter than a Dragon's fire. And the entire movie she shoes her inner fire by hiding behind rocks.Rating: landfill.
